levels.description: To defeat Ball Man, you must penetrate deep into the Ball Fortress...

props.children: Mini Barf is a maker from the Democratic Republic of Canadia whose interests include Mario Maker, Monster Rancher 2, and hanging out with friends.

level.alt: Level screenshot of Mega Mario vs Ball Man

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Mega Mario vs Ball Man

levels.description: The odds are stacked against you as the Boos pile up and surround you!

props.children: Frank is still upset he didn't get the game early enough to prevent having to slap 88 behind his name. He is however extremely happy to be part of this great project.

level.alt: Level screenshot of Phantom Parade

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Phantom Parade

levels.description: Escape the haunted swamp and let the vines lead the way! Just don't let them drag you down to your poisonous grave...

props.children: Nabuz is ecstatic to be back for 6YMM, and can't believe it's been a year since his 5YMM level came out two weeks ago!

level.alt: Level screenshot of Spookswamp Romp

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Spookswamp Romp

levels.description: Through several years of heavy taxes, non-refundable donations, and political controversy, the scarcely populated Snow Kingdom is finally on the POWer grid! Homeowners have scrambled to hire workers from the neighboring POWer company to install POWer circuits in their homes. However, there have been multiple complaints of shoddy workmanship and concerns over the quality of installation begin to grow. One customer, who wishes to remain anonymous, stated: "It's like they sent a plumber to do an electrician's job!" Now homeowners are looking to the Snow Kingdom to fix their POWer circuits. With a lack of affordable technicians in the area and spending already over budget, the Snow Kingdom has placed a small advertisement in the classified section of the local newspaper Snow Time Like the Present that reads: "Looking to recruit an eager candidate willing to learn a new trade and forego monetary compensation. Cake will be provided upon full restoration of POWer."

props.children: Grakowsky has been fed a healthy dose of puzzles and therefore has not exploded... yet.

level.alt: Level screenshot of POWer Circuits

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of POWer Circuits

levels.description: How are you gentlemen!! All your base are belong to us. You are on the way to destruction. What you say!! You have no chance to survive make your time. Ha Ha Ha Ha....

props.children: Mogsy is a 33-year-old moogle who makes music in Mario Maker. He is a purveyor of memes and pranks—some of which only funny to him. Beware of shinies and expect a mad lad, fakeout, or feesh.

level.alt: Level screenshot of All Your Boss Bass

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of All Your Boss Bass

levels.description: Disclaimers and guide: The Pinktops Corporation assumes no liability for injury, fatalities, or emotional or psychic trauma experienced by patrons. We kindly ask that corpses and any severed appendages be deposited in the nearest pit. Spectators are encouraged to cheer on their champions, but to please refrain from mocking wounded riders. One pink coin for each year of Mario Maker is required to access the concession stand.

props.children: Pinktops uses advanced mechanics to make memorable traditional courses that are, above all else, fun! AKA "Pink Triceratops" in the maker community, he is creative, cretaceous, and has three horns... which is 3x better than a unicorn.

level.alt: Level screenshot of Railgun Run

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Railgun Run

levels.description: Roy thought it would be awful swell to renovate his decommissioned fortress into a luxury resort with a swingin' ballroom for the ages, an Art Deco palace with a red-hot floor that sizzles with the shuffle. But by now you know what the construction sector in the Mushroom Kingdom is like, and already all the tilework is a shifty, crumbling wreck. Time to put on your dancing shoes, stomp on all the safety violations, and show the proprietor of the Hotel Chez Roy who's boss!

props.children: QuixoticN is a jazz musician who has never built a music level, a puzzle-solving streamer who has never built a puzzle level, and a tournament Scrabble player who has never built a Scrabble level. Fortunately for his latest contribution to the Years of Mario Maker festivities, he is neither a platform nor a gimmick.

level.alt: Level screenshot of Thwompin' at the Savoy

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Thwompin' at the Savoy

levels.description: EMERGENCY ORDER: DEFEAT THE MARIOID CODE-NAMED "DREAD"!

props.children: Zen-mai* is a Japanese level maker who is into creating music courses, and who discovered a very effective looping music technique that he is proud to call the Zenmai Method.

level.alt: Level screenshot of Marioid Dread

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Marioid Dread

levels.description: Pokey is surprised at the vast design space provided by clear pipes. It seems clear pipes can do everything from toggling on/off switches to activating exclamation blocks!

props.children: Persia is a big fan of Nintendo games who makes unique levels in SMM2, and who takes his name from the MS-DOS version of the classic video game Prince of Persia. He hates pineapple pizza.

level.alt: Level screenshot of Clear Pipe Switch

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Clear Pipe Switch

levels.description: Fling floating fish fast and far, forget fundamentals, and focus on finding flying footholds in this fun foray.

props.children: Rybonez is an American maker who focuses primarily on platforming challenges with occasional puzzle or precision elements. In his opinion, the most satisfying levels and challenges are those that require not only timing and skill, but also anticipation and creativity. Also, alliteration's absolutely always an awesome addition.

level.alt: Level screenshot of Flying Fish Foray

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Flying Fish Foray

levels.description: While on a long journey, you find yourself inside a highly active volcanic castle. Surf and make your way across the ever rising and falling lava to escape to safety.

props.children: Tino is known for the variety of different types of levels he made. Although his passion for Mario Maker has been declining after 4YMM in which he contributed, he still got himself to work on a level for this year's project.

level.alt: Level screenshot of Tides Reversed It

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Tides Reversed It

levels.description: Let's go on an adventure while listening to good loop music! Mario approaches a galaxy unlike any other, full of gadgets, anomalies, and blocks that appear and disappear. Can Mario navigate these obstacles cautiously enough to rescue his friend from certain danger?

props.children: RBC is a very prolific music level maker, since it's actually the only course type he's good at. However, he took the opportunity to level up his craft with the help of the other 6YMM participants.

level.alt: Level screenshot of Shifting Starship Galaxy

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Shifting Starship Galaxy

levels.description: Someone seems to have tinkered with your explosives! Your bombs can change the state of blocks when reaching high temperatures. Utilise this newfound ability to traverse the castle towers.

props.children: Zurfink is a Swedish software engineer who has always been a fan of Nintendo. He started making levels in Super Mario Maker 2, and this is his second year as a contributor to the annual celebrations.

level.alt: Level screenshot of Enigmatic Explosives

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Enigmatic Explosives

levels.description: Mario has found a pale pair of Para-Thwomps and wants to go for a ride. Despite Mario’s intense desire, these Thwomps remain stiff and unflinching to his advances. Even an offer of mushrooms, and hype for his fabled jumping prowess could not sway them from their firm posture. Will Mario convince them to gravitate in his direction, or will he be crushed by the mounting pressure?

props.children: Salt Lake, like all other landlocked bodies of water, prefers fast-paced video games that don’t waste time with peripheral details like double-entendres or wordplay jokes. As a self-respecting mass of hydrogen and sodium chloride, Salt Lake has no time for such things and is far too busy maintaining salinity through an increased evaporation rate. But like all endorheic lakes, this might just be a means from which to run from a self-aware existentialism so massive that its buoyancy is nullified by its sheer Lovecraftian horror—or fast-paced platforming is just fun.

level.alt: Level screenshot of Pale Pair of Para-Thwomps

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Pale Pair of Para-Thwomps

levels.description: A crossover in a 6YMM level?! Mario pretends to be Furret in this musical adventure. Use different power-ups to open up many paths, so you can walk to new and exciting places unscathed.

props.children: Koneko is a Dutch Mario Maker streamer who enjoys creating levels in a wide range of genres, from the technical to the musical, with a side of trolls and more. Even after six years of playing, they're not very good at the game... but that's okay, because then their creations can never be too frustrating (apart from the trolls, of course).

level.alt: Level screenshot of Maker Walk

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Maker Walk

levels.description: Mario needs to use carcasses of dry bones to surf over lava pits at high speeds. Have fun!

props.children: Major314 is a 15-year-old maker who has always tried to make good levels, whether they are platformers, puzzles, or even trolls. When he got Super Mario Maker 1, he fell in love with the game, and now he plays Mario Maker almost every day, trying to improve his level design.

level.alt: Level screenshot of Magma Surf

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Magma Surf

levels.description: Use the on/offs to stick to the ceilings and fly around with your winged boot. Better keep your boot on when you hit an on/off block, or there will be trouble!

props.children: Wariuzzo is an Italian guy who likes to play video games, in particular the platformer genre. In Mario Maker he loves to craft challenging levels that revolve around a unique concept or unexplored mechanic, making them enjoyable for all types of players.

level.alt: Level screenshot of Bootstrapped

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Bootstrapped

levels.description: Mario has been tasked by the Mushroom Kingdom High Council to infiltrate Wendy's and uncover the secret to how they prepare Hot Drinks. While attempting to steal the prized VHS training video, Mario is caught red-handed by Wendy and must fight his way out. Uncover the truth, fill it up to the line, and get yourself a juicy slice... of cake. If you make it out alive, report your findings to the High Council.

props.children: Every year, com_poser is called upon by Kiavik to create a level for YMM featuring a random meme. If this meme means nothing to you, you're not alone. Write a letter to Google, mail it in, wait 2-4 weeks for a reply, and then enjoy this level responsibly. Stay thirsty, friends.

level.alt: Level screenshot of Wendy's Hot Drinks

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Wendy's Hot Drinks

levels.description: To infiltrate this spooky station you'll want to keep your goomba mask. Unless you think you're really cool and want to invade without a disguise... but that's a bit arrogant, isn't it?

props.children: Pax is a E-list Mario celebrity trying to climb up to C-list with his newest innovation, the Unrefreshing level, featuring complete silence and complete darkness!

level.alt: Level screenshot of Infiltration Station

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Infiltration Station

levels.description: Hangin' out with the skullboys!

props.children: Mang is no longer Mang. D: (jk)

level.alt: Level screenshot of A Pile of Sans

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of A Pile of Sans

levels.description: Ready for those flashing lights, they'll chase you down until…

props.children: Ben S is a new addition to the YMM crew. He is a music aficionado and meddles with mangling many magnificent melodies.

level.alt: Level screenshot of Super Meat Dress

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Super Meat Dress

levels.description: It seems like the chomps are being controlled by an unknown force... better watch out for unexpected behaviour!

props.children: Mr Sparky, or MrElectrodude, is a 20-year-old computer science student from the Netherlands with a passion for playing games. He supposes he should say something new this time... uhhh, he likes soccer? Yeah, that should do.

level.alt: Level screenshot of Master of Puppets

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Master of Puppets

levels.description: Mario decides to become like Sonic to prevent the Mushroom Kingdom from turning into Eggman Land. Will you chase or be chased in this fight with Dr. Egg... Roy? And where will the miracles sung by the Chaos Emeralds take you?

props.children: ShuShuro has a huge attachment to Nintendo games and loves to create classic-style levels. As our knowledge of maker technology advances day by day, so does his interest in mimicking other games.

level.alt: Level screenshot of Spinic the Hedgehog

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Spinic the Hedgehog

levels.description: In the beginning Kiavik created the project and the level. And the level was without form, and void; and soft-locks were upon the face of the deep. And the Spinies of Kiavik moved upon the face of the waters. And Kiavik said, Let there be crates: and there were crates.

props.children: Kiavik spent all of 5YMM hyped for Bonfire Peaks while waiting for players to find his cake, and one full year later (rounded up), was inspired to make a level that also revolves around moving crates everywhere.

level.alt: Level screenshot of Cratest Story Ever Told

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Cratest Story Ever Told

levels.description: Scramble over surfaces that appear on the fly! As the castle is smashed to pieces, new platforms will emerge from the wreckage.

props.children: GreenStarC wishes to thank all the players who offered feedback and posted entertaining comment cards on Into the Wurmhole. Some of these made him especially happy and deserve an honourable mention. For the amazing artwork: Usabell, Mang, Gilmore, Fusiongt. And for the colourful comments: Walrus!, Tave, DannyBruh, Scriabin, Sgt. Bomb, Kokoloko. You all made his day; now enjoy his latest level!

level.alt: Level screenshot of All Is Dust

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of All Is Dust

levels.description: It's a hard-knock life down in the mines: OSHA violations, unpaid overtime, no sunlight for days at a time. It's enough to make a manic miner out of Mario. Time to beat up your boss and steal his car.

props.children: Luwuka is sad because the project is near its end, and soon Luwuka will need to go back to the basement. Where is 7YMM?

level.alt: Level screenshot of Powerless Plumber

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Powerless Plumber

levels.description: Yesterday I woke up sucking a lemon cake. Put everything in its right place! This one's for Kiavik, Geitje, and Kid Ɐ.

props.children: Ms. Yarrow lives in a house with Mr. Yarrow, who won't play this game because they hid the questioning mushrooms. She enjoys controlling pipes with magic and wishes the gameperson to be filled with wonder.

level.alt: Level screenshot of Rightplace

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Rightplace

levels.description: Cheese Block Sahara is a level designed to show the true potential of turn blocks, an underused and underrated course part.

props.children: Supernova likes AC/DC.

level.alt: Level screenshot of Cheese Block Sahara

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Cheese Block Sahara

levels.description:
Control and manipulate the spike balls using the Dry Bones shell.

P.S. According to the 4YMM narrator, Lantis makes levels where it is impossible to die, unlike all those hard levels that hog screen time on stream... so this level is for him! Blame that fellow instead if you die a lot here—and good luck with finding the cake!

props.children: Lantis makes annoying and boring levels, but he is also the creator of the most-starred YMM levels across both Mario Maker games, [1YMM] A Tale of 2 Koopa Friends and [4YMM] Wildflower. Most of his creations are easy because he can't clear anything very hard.

level.alt: Level screenshot of Spikey Wakey

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Spikey Wakey

levels.description: Watch out for wildlife and rowdy roadblocks in this shoddy shrubbery-filled city. Also be sure to find the cool-beans secrets!

props.children: Choo_choo is a sentient locomotive with an insatiable hunger for making levels. He's super excited to be back for another week of YMM, but less excited that he's not making a 3DW level this time around. (Shout-out to FoxMaker for his motivation, as he continues to affectionately hassle the steam engine to make more levels!)

level.alt: Level screenshot of Baby Beanstalk Boulevard

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Baby Beanstalk Boulevard

levels.description:
Beware Death Mountain, a vile evil place
Where Chomps are chained and Music Blocks play,
Where you discover yourself or are puzzled astray,
Where the path to go forward is not always cake.

children: General BB is your favourite maker’s maker. He invented many widely adopted techniques to push the game to new limits—including his personal favourite, Global Looping Music, for which he has written extensive tutorials in his Global Music Guide. He also loves to share his inventions and posts about them regularly on
. For this level, he put two songs from The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past in the game using advanced looping music techniques.

level.alt: Level screenshot of Death Mountain

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Death Mountain

levels.description:
Our plumber has no mustache on his face.
His overalls are nowhere to be seen.
The Master Sword will take a plunger's place,
With crimson cap replaced by one of green.

Instead of Princess Peach's standard tale,
Another princess gives a different quest.
An uncle's whisper warns to never fail,
For Zelda is your... (figure out the rest),

And when the war is won, and curses break
By courage facing overwhelming odds,
Could he accept a simple kiss and cake
When tempted with the power of the gods?

When he returns to pipes from whence he came,
He still will think and dream another game.

props.children: Four Wings, also known as Tetrapteryx or Jon, has been playing video games ever since he got the original NES for Christmas in 1988. His favourite video game of all time is The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past, so he's decided it's about time he created a tribute to that game in Super Mario Maker.

level.alt: Level screenshot of The Light and Dark Worlds

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of The Light and Dark Worlds

levels.description: Choose one of the four gods' weapons to protect you in the impregnable burning festival. This is all about strategy!

props.children: Ichigotan loves to make action-packed experiences that also serve as musical tributes to anime and video games.

level.alt: Level screenshot of Burning Festival

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Burning Festival

levels.description: Use the SMB2 mushroom to throw moles (and a Goomba) and ride them in low gravity. Do a barrel mole!

props.children: MegaTefyt is a 39-year-old software developer from Germany. He is known for the Get a Life! series, but loves to make platforming levels which are not too hard. He has not made levels since 4YMM, but now he is back for the latest event.

level.alt: Level screenshot of Do a Barrel Mole!

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Do a Barrel Mole!

levels.description: Munchers behave as waves when they bounce in harmony, which is why the wave theory of munchers has been proposed. In a certain ruin in a desert country, the existence of a mechanism that turns munchers into large waves has been confirmed, and it is believed that these were set up to repel intruders from the ruin. It is very interesting that people in far ancient times already understood this theory and applied it to the construction of these mechanisms.

props.children: Magatoro is a Japanese level creator who likes to make levels with complex mechanics and gimmicks, as you may remember vividly from New Donk Nightmare Again in 5YMM.

level.alt: Level screenshot of Muncher Wave

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Muncher Wave

levels.description: Hit the things to make the things fly out, then catch the things to reach more things!

props.children: Donkeymint Incorporated is the leading business at the forefront of donkey mint production.

level.alt: Level screenshot of Lobstacle Course

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Lobstacle Course

levels.description: Poor Sonic's all flat now. Will you step on him again? >:(

props.children: sus

level.alt: Level screenshot of Life After Stepping

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Life After Stepping

levels.description: Deep in the Goombrat Wetlands lies a mysterious mire. Legend has it that the tides of this marsh change direction depending on the way one is facing. Navigate the Switchback Swamp and search for cake deep within its woods, but be warned! No traveller has ever made it out alive.

props.children: jacjson doesn't think you can pronounce jacjson.

level.alt: Level screenshot of Switchback Swamp

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Switchback Swamp

levels.description: It's a spring cold spell and the frozen frogs can't slide! But what mischievous sorcerer cast this frigid spell?

props.children: Pinktops uses advanced mechanics to make memorable traditional courses that are, above all else, fun! AKA "Pink Triceratops" in the maker community, he is creative, cretaceous, and has three horns... which is 3x better than a unicorn.

level.alt: Level screenshot of Frostfrog Frolic

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Frostfrog Frolic

levels.description:
Deep within the crypt of the Mushronomicon, you come across a massive horde of rotten mushrooms. Left with no other choice, you are forced to call upon the aid of the Ukiki's Paw. As you wish upon the relic for a way to get deeper into the crypt, its finger curls. As expected, you see the same strange faces that smiled at your brother's accident in the factory. The face with wiry eyes begins to whisper in your ear: "Good to see you again. I've turned most of those cursed mushrooms into power-ups. I've even prepared a most delicious cake if you can dodge every power-up and grab both keys."

As you wonder what the catch is, the entity gives a wry smile, and speaks again. "However, these power-ups are still cursed. If you collect 3 power-ups or rotten mushrooms without your health being replenished, I'll be forced to dispose of you. You'll make a fine addition to my dinner table, which I've set up deep within the crypt." 

Of course, this is the catch. As usual, the face with the wiry eyes has twisted your wish into a deadly game. As you muster up your courage, you realize a horrifying fact...

These power-ups move far more strangely than rotten mushrooms do...

props.children: Theorymon aspires to be an astrophysicist, and has a deep love for Mario Maker and competitive Pokemon. While he likes to challenge people's grasp of Mario conventions with his levels at times, Theorymon is an admirer of the "Kishotenketsu" style of level design that Nintendo employs in modern Mario levels as well.

level.alt: Level screenshot of Monkey's Paw-er-ups

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Monkey's Paw-er-ups

levels.description: Your friends better wear a helmet when they do the Safety Dance, or they may get left behind. Enjoy the greatest hit of the Canadian new wave/synthpop group Men Without Hats. As it is with many great Canadian creations, this song only reaches its full potential after being co-opted by an American and passed on as our own.

props.children: DTSpies was left behind in '82 for refusing to dance and made this level as a shot at redemption.

level.alt: Level screenshot of Marios Without Hats

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Marios Without Hats

levels.description: Welcome to Aperture Laboratories, where we develop and holistically test... holes! We've prepared the most technologically advanced holes, and we need you to test them! We're 97% sure they're safe, so if we round that number, they're 100% safe! The Aperture Elevator™ will remember which chambers you have completed and take you to the correct floor upon deat—we mean, an unsatisfactory test result. Delicious and edible cake is awarded only to the best testers, so good luck!

props.children: Nabuz is out of ideas for a maker description, so he's going to be sappy instead and thank the YMM team and entire Mario Maker community for helping make an event like this possible.

level.alt: Level screenshot of Aperture Testing Facility

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Aperture Testing Facility

levels.description: Beat Blocks are not enough! Let's give 'em Beat Blasters! Don't get squished!

props.children: Aegis is an old-school maker who sticks vehemently to traditional designs to feed on nostalgia. Clean aesthetics are his main priority—so bear the gameplay, will ya? Have fun!

level.alt: Level screenshot of Drifting Switches

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Drifting Switches

levels.description: Fight your way across a train and up the tower to the beats of Streets of Rage!

props.children: Skelthane is a pastry chef with a love for all sorts of artistic expression, from food to maker levels. They love retro video game music, especially the work of Yuzo Koshiro and Michiru Yamane, and try to recreate some of that magic in their maker levels. They are a newer but highly dedicated maker, creating their 6YMM level in the middle of a hurricane.

level.alt: Level screenshot of Boom Boom Bare Knuckle

levelThumbnail.alt: Level thumbnail of Boom Boom Bare Knuckle
